Source.Name: imake
Source.Summary: Imake is used to generate Makefiles from a template, a set of cpp macro functions, and a per-directory input file called an Imakefile.
Source.Description: Imake is used to generate Makefiles from a template, a set of cpp macro functions, and a per-directory input file called an Imakefile.
